channel.title: A client for mac?
channel.description: Hello everyone, i have a slight problem. Im using a somewhat new mac and i need a client that will work on mac like [i]MoparScape[/i], but [i]MoparScape[/i] is old and i cant see many of the items on server. [i]Silab[/i] would be great except it doesn't work on mac and every client i try other than [i]Mopar[/i] doesn't work for mac. If Someone could please tell the Dl link of a client that works for mac that would be great, thanks.

item.title: A client for mac?
item.dc:creator: @roguex roguex
item.description:
@roguex wrote:

Mostly because mac cant run .bats THERE WINDOWS, you can install java runtime and play, any already jar clients though. ;D

Read full topic

yh hmm my mate has the mac and mopar client only works on mac hes tried loads he cant get 1 to work :[,
